name: Scores – Livescore for football, soccer, tennis, basketball, handball, volleyball & hockey
author: lswjohn

sections.description:
Features

The wordpress plugin ‘Live Scores’ is covering up to 7 sport events in more than 250+ countries currently under 4 Languages. (EN/IT/FR/ES) – We will be adding more languages every week!

  • American Football ( NFL & CFL )

  • Basketball

  • Handball

  • Ice Hockey

  • Soccer / Football

  • Tennis ( ATP & WTA )

  • Volleyball

For Soccer Live Scores

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[soccerblue] – Blue & White Layout

For Tennis Live Scores.

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[tennisblue] – Blue & White Layout

For Basketball Live Scores.

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[basketballblue] – Blue & White Layout

For Hockey Live Scores.

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[hockeyblue] – Blue & White Layout

For American Football Live Scores.

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[americanfootballblue] – Blue & White Layout

For Baseball Live Scores.

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[baseballblue] – Blue & White Layout

For Handball Live Scores.

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[handballblue] – Blue & White Layout

For Volleyball Live Scores.

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[volleyballblue] – Blue & White Layout

ITALIAN – Risultati in tempo reale

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[basketballit] – Basketball / Blu modello

[calcioit] – Calcio / Blu modello

[footballit] – Football American / Blu modello

[hockeyit] – Hockey / Blu modello

[pallamanoit] – Pallamano / Blu modello

[pallavoloit] – Pallavolo / Blu modello

[tennisit] – Tennis / Blu modello

FRENCH – Scores en direct

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[basketballbluefr] – Basketball / Layout Bleu

[footballbluefr] – Foot / Layout Bleu

[americanfootballbluefr] – Football Americain / Layout Bleu

[handballbluefr] – Handball / Layout Bleu

[hockeybluefr] – Hockey / Layout Bleu

[volleyballbluefr] – Volley / Layout Bleu

[tennisbluefr] – Tennis / Layout Bleu

SPANISH – Resultatos en vivo

****** Available Shortcodes *********

[baloncestoes] – Baloncesto / Layout Azul

[balonmanoes] – Balonmano / Layout Azul

[futbolamericanes] – Futbol American / Layout Azul

[futboles] – Futbol / Layout Azul

[hockeyes] – Hockey / Layout Azul

[voleiboles] – Voleibol / Layout Azul

[tenises] – Tenis / Layout Azul

Is it 100% FREE?

Absolutely Yes.
sections.installation:
1. Upload the live-scores folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the Live Scores through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Configure the plugin by going to the Live Scores menu that appears in your admin menu
sections.faq:
Q: After plugin installation how can i embed the live scores script?

A: Please use one of the following shortcodes:

See plugin settings for shortcode availability.

short_description: Livescores with NO ADS! Display our free livescore widget for Soccer, American Football (NFL,CFL), Tennis (APT,WTA), Basketball, Handball, Volleyball  …
